section.title: w3af
section.p: We ran the OWASP Top Ten profile against Open Server Watch and NetMon.
section.pre: $ w3af_console w3af>>> target w3af/config:target>>> set target http://monitoring.sittingduck.bv w3af/config:target>>> back w3af>>> profiles w3af/profiles>>> use OWASP_TOP10 w3af/profiles>>> back w3af>>> start
section.p: Nothing relevant (that hadn't already been found by manual analysis) was reported.
